name: test-access-control
description: A Fastify-based Web API server to test access control mechanisms

scripts.build: tsc && mkdir -p dist/database && cp source/database/schema.sql dist/database/
scripts.db:seed: npm run build && node scripts/db-manager.js seed
scripts.db:reset: npm run build && node scripts/db-manager.js reset
scripts.db:restock: npm run build && node scripts/db-manager.js restock
scripts.db:stats: npm run build && node scripts/db-manager.js stats
scripts.db:clean-sessions: npm run build && node scripts/db-manager.js clean-sessions
scripts.db:export-users: npm run build && node scripts/db-manager.js export-users
scripts.db:export-products: npm run build && node scripts/db-manager.js export-products
